Summary: Very bright light moving in a continuous triangular motion behind the clouds at a very high speed
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside the front of my house at about 07:30pm on Thursday 6th March to remove some rubbish sacks when two of my teenage neighbours (approx 13 and 14 years of age) asked me what I thought the strange light movements in sky immediately above us were. It was evening and very dark, and the cloud cover was quite thick, but a light movement coming from behind the clouds was very visible. At first I thought it might be a helicopter, but the movements were so fast and covering such a large distance that I realised that it was highly unlikely to be a normal aircraft of any type that I could think of. The light movements were very repetitive and in a triangular motion, they continued for some 15 minutes in roughly the same area before I decided to go back indoors. During the event, I made some joking remark to my teenage neighbours that it was a aliens, which they both appeared to not want to believe. I've seen this once before several months ago, again witnessed by many other people in roughly the same area.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bradford

This sighting has never been favorited.
